properties.title: Before you start...
properties.block1: Know your water source. Use the water that comes from your regular basis. If you have doubts about the quality of water, you should check with your local water advisor. Solvatten does not treat chemical contamination like arsenic or fluoride. Solvatten only treats water contaminated with micro-biological pathogens.

properties.value: By starting as the sun comes up, you get the best chance of treating water successfully several times per day.
Make sure the indicator is RED with a sad smiley when you start. If it is not red, push she yellow Sun Button to reset it; read chapter 9.
The water should be clear enough for you to see through a glassful (less than 40 NTU).
If the water is very muddy, you should prefilter it first; read chapter 10.
Open ALL FOUR caps to make it easier to fill
Pour the water in through the openings with BLACK CAPS and filters. The filters make the water less muddy and remove more significant micro-organisms.
Pour in the water from a height. Fill Solvatten to the top so that the water surrounds the indicator. Otherwise, the indicator will not work
Tighten all four caps firmly but do not use force. Close the caps when Solvatten is upright.

If the indicator is GREEN and shows a happy
smiley you should reset the indicator by
pushing the yellow Sun Button. Do not push if
it is already RED.

IMPORTANT! The face on the indicator must
be RED, and a sad smiley should appear
when you start.

properties.title: Put Solvatten in a good place

properties.value:
Open up and place Solvatten facing the sun.
Put Solvatten fully open with the transparent
surfaces facing directly towards the sun.

Adjust the position at 90° degrees to the sun.
A ring in the center of the lid throws a shadow
and helps you find the optimal angle towards the
sun. IMPORTANT: If laid flat or at too steep an
angle, Solvatten will work more slowly!

Make sure Solvatten is sheltered from the
wind. It should be in a place without a shadow
throughout the day. Leave Solvatten in the sunshine
for 2-6 hours.

If you place Solvatten on a surface such as a
bed of hay or similar will help it heat up faster.

Protect from wind chill. A large bag cut open
can be used to provide some shelter from wind
and make Solvatten work faster.

If the weather is cold, use a pillow or blanket to
provide insulation and speed up the process.

properties.title: The face turns green and happy

properties.value: The water will be very hot after a while.

When the temperature reaches 55 celsius, a
green face shows, and the water will be safe
for drinking.

properties.title: Use the white caps when pouring water out

properties.value:
IMPORTANT! Pour out the treated water
through the openings with WHITE CAPS
Be careful - the water can be very hot!

Use hot water for personal hygiene. Having
a bath in hot water feels good.
If too hot, you should let it cool first.

Fill water in a tippy tap stand. Always do handwashing
with soap and water from Solvatten
after visiting the toilet, before eating and
preparing food. It will improve your and your
family members’ health.

Pre-heating water for cooking will save you
much fuel. Solvatten can replace a lot of
firewood, coal, or gas.

Use safe water when rinsing and preparing
your food.

To make more batches of Solvatten, pour the
water into a clean container. Always use a lid
and a tap to avoid re-contamination. Keep
the container away from the floor.

To keep the water hot, you can pour it into a
thermos.

Place Solvatten in the shade to cool the water;
it will soon be ready to drink.

Keep your treated water in Solvatten or in
clean jars with lids to avoid re-contamination.
Water treated through Solvatten can safely
be stored for 24 hours.

properties.title: When the water is very muddy

properties.value:
Before using Solvatten, the water should be
clear enough for you to see through a glassful
(less than 40 NTU).

If the water is very muddy, you should filter or
sediment it (leave the water for a while to let
the particles settle to the bottom).

Another way is to build a sand and stone filter
with two buckets and a tap. Line a bucket
with a cloth, then fill it with sand and stones
of different sizes. Let the water run through.

You can also make a simple sand filter. Use a
plastic bottle, cut off the top, put some fabric
in the bottom and fill it up with sand and
stones. Let the water run through. Seeds from
the moringa can also help to reduce
the turbidity, (cloudiness) of the water.

If the filters look dirty or clogged, you can take
them out and rinse them with water.

Rinse the filter with safe water, holding it
gently between your fingers. You can also let
the filter boil for a few minutes.

If you have lost or damaged your filter, you can
make your own. Take a big piece of cloth and
fold it into two or three layers. The new filter
must be big enough to cover the holes where
you pour in the water.

Place the folded cloth over the opening and
cut around the edge. If the filter ring is gone,
you can tie a string around the opening to
keep the fabric in position.
Rinse Solvatten with water when it looks dirty.

IMPORTANT! Avoid scratching. Do not wipe or
scrub the transparent surface with sand.
To get rid of dirt and dust on the outside,
rinse the containers by pouring over some
water.

Wash the inside with hot water using a soft
plastic bottle brush.

You can make your brush with a fresh twig
wrapped with a cloth

Put a handful of dry beans, lentils, or woolen
balls into Solvatten. Add a cupful of clean
water.

Shake and rinse out. That will help to clean
away any mud inside the containers. You
can add juice from a lemon or lime to help
clean the unit.

Do not put any sand into Solvatten or scrub it on the outside with sand. Do not place Solvatten
empty and open with caps closed facing the sun. Avoid any rough handling and do not
use Solvatten to transport water that is far away from home. Do not fill with muddy water.

properties.question: What is Solvatten and how does it work?
properties.answer: Solvatten is a portable water purifier that uses solar energy to make water safe for drinking, cooking, and hygiene. It combines heat and ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun to treat contaminated water in a simple, sustainable way. The water is purified by placing the Solvatten unit in direct sunlight for 2-6 hours, depending on the weather conditions.

properties.question: How much water can Solvatten treat at once?
properties.answer: Each Solvatten unit can treat up to 10 liters of water at a time. The process can be repeated multiple times a day depending on sunlight availability, allowing families to purify enough water for their daily needs.

properties.question: Is Solvatten safe to use for children and the elderly?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten is designed to be safe for people of all ages. It uses a natural process with no chemicals, ensuring that the water is safe for consumption, including by children and the elderly.

properties.question: What kind of water can Solvatten purify?
properties.answer: Solvatten can treat water from various sources, including rivers, lakes, and rainwater. However, it is important to avoid using water that contains heavy contamination such as chemicals or industrial waste, as Solvatten is not designed to remove such pollutants.

properties.question: How long does the Solvatten unit last?
properties.answer: Solvatten units are built to last for up to 7-10 years with proper use and care. The durable materials are resistant to weather conditions and wear and tear.

properties.question: How can I tell if the water is safe to drink after using Solvatten?
properties.answer: Solvatten includes a visual indicator on the unit that shows when the water has reached a safe temperature and UV exposure level. Once the indicator shows that the water is ready, it is safe for consumption.

properties.question: Can Solvatten be used during cloudy days?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten can still work on cloudy days, but the purification process will take longer. It may take up to 6 hours or more for the water to be fully treated depending on the weather conditions.

properties.question: Is Solvatten environmentally friendly?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten is highly sustainable. It reduces the need for boiling water over firewood or other fossil fuels, helping to decrease deforestation and carbon emissions. Additionally, it doesn’t require batteries or electricity, making it an eco-friendly solution.

properties.question: Can Solvatten be used for purposes other than drinking water?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten-treated water can also be used for cooking, washing, and hygiene purposes. The unit provides hot water, which is useful for various household needs.

properties.question: What maintenance is required for Solvatten?
properties.answer: Solvatten requires minimal maintenance. After each use, it is recommended to rinse the unit and let it dry. The transparent panels should be kept clean to ensure maximum sunlight exposure. Occasionally check for any wear and tear on the seals and parts.

properties.question: Where can I buy Solvatten?
properties.answer: Solvatten is available for purchase through the official Solvatten website, as well as through partner organizations and distributors. You can also contact local NGOs or humanitarian organizations that work with water access to inquire about availability in your region.

properties.question: What are the benefits of using Solvatten in remote areas?
properties.answer: In remote areas without reliable access to clean water or electricity, Solvatten provides a self-sustaining solution for safe drinking water. It reduces the need for firewood to boil water, saving time and resources while promoting better health and hygiene.

properties.question: Does Solvatten eliminate all harmful microorganisms from water?
properties.answer: Yes, Solvatten is effective at killing bacteria, viruses, and parasites through a combination of solar UV radiation and heat. However, it is not designed to remove chemical pollutants or heavy metals from the water.

properties.question: Test 1
Where do you pour in the water?

properties.value: Through the openings with black caps and filters.
Through any of the openings.
Through the narrow opening at the bottom of the container.
Through the large opening at the back of the container.

properties.heading: Avoid scratching the surface

properties.question: Why should you always fill Solvatten all the way to the top?

properties.value: Because the indicator works properly when fully covered by water.
Because leaving space lets the water expand.
Because filling it halfway up leaves the water boiling.
Because overfilling can cause it to get dirty.

properties.details: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

properties.question: How should the water look before you pour it into Solvatten?

properties.value: It should be cloudy or dirty.
It should have bits and pieces in it.
It should be clear enough to see through a glassful.
It should be yellowish or brown.

properties.details: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

properties.question: When should you push the Sun Button?

properties.value: Press once the water starts to boil.
Press after Solvatten has been in the sun for an hour.
Press so it shows a red face when you start.
Press after Solvatten has been in the sun for five minutes.

properties.question: How do you place Solvatten when you start using it?

properties.value: Place Solvatten in a shaded area, out of direct sunlight.
Place Solvatten at a 90°C angle facing the sun, preferably in a no-wind or shadow spot.
Place Solvatten in a shaded area with little sunlight.
Place Solvatten in direct sunlight with wind to help it dry faster.

properties.question: When is the water safe to drink?

properties.value: When it has boiled for around 10 minutes.
When the water is clear and cool.
When the water steams and feels cool to touch.
When the face on the indicator turns green and its within 24 hours.

properties.question: Where do you pour the water out?

properties.value: From the bottom of the container.
From the openings with black caps and filters.
From the openings with the white caps.
From the spout on the side of the container.

properties.question: How should you store the treated water?

properties.value: Keep it in an open container.
Keep it in a clean, closed pot away from the ground.
Keep it in a clear bottle.
Keep it in the Solvatten kit.

properties.question: How might you use the hot water?

properties.value: For personal hygiene, cooking food, or use it for tea or coffee.
For cleaning the roof, washing your phone, and drying clothes.
For washing the dog, polishing furniture, and making ice cubes.
For watering plants, cleaning shoes, and filling a swimming pool.

properties.question: Why should you never use sand when washing Solvatten?

properties.value: Sand helps clean the container faster.
Sand scratches the plastic and reduces the effectiveness of Solvatten.
Sand makes the container heat up too quickly.
Sand clears the filters faster.

properties.question: What do you do when the weather is cloudy?

properties.value: Nothing. You can still drink the water after a few hours.
Boil the water to make it clean and hot by using the source of energy at hand.
Protect it with an umbrella.
Hold it high.

properties.question: What is the main job of the clear plastic covers on the Solvatten kit?

properties.value: They reflect solar radiation to reduce exposure to the water.
They let 90°C of solar radiation through to heat the water.
They block UV radiation to protect the water.
They block heat to keep the water cooler.

properties.question: Why is UV radiation important for cleaning the water in the Solvatten kit?

properties.value: Because it destroys harmful microorganisms by damaging their DNA.
Because it helps the water stay cold.
Because it makes the water taste better.
Because it makes the water look clearer.

properties.question: Why is heat important in cleaning the water in Solvatten?

properties.value: Because it helps filter out larger particles, making the water clearer.
Because it activates the UV radiation, helping it work better.
Because it destroys microorganisms by raising the temperature to 50-60°C.
Because it speeds up the cleaning process, making the water safer.

properties.question: How does higher altitude affect the Solvatten kit?

properties.value: The kit becomes less effective because the atmosphere absorbs more solar energy at higher altitudes.
The kit becomes more effective because thinner air allows more solar energy reach it.
The kit’s performance is the same at all altitudes, as solar radiation doesn’t change.
The kit works better at lower altitudes because the air keeps more heat.

properties.question: What is the best way to position Solvatten to get the most solar energy?

properties.value: Stand it up straight for consistent energy all year.
Keep it at a fixed angle to keep heat in, no matter the time or season.
Place it parallel to the sun and adjust it in the morning and evening.
Tilt it at a 90°C angle such that the lid ring aligns with its shadow.

properties.question: What is one of the key long-term benefits of using Solvatten, particularly for women in households?

properties.value: Women gain access to more expensive household products.
Women can exclusively switch to electric cooking methods, reducing their reliance on firewood.
Women can avoid the costs of cooking oil.
Women can reduce their daily time spent collecting water and firewood, allowing for more time for education and income-generating activities.

properties.question: How can someone save money by using Solvatten?

properties.value: By not owning one, as the Solvatten kit itself is an expense.
By connecting it to the electricity grid.
By using it to generate electricity for your home.
By eliminating the need to buy fuel for boiling water, such as firewood or gas.

properties.question: How does Solvatten contribute to the preparation of food for small businesses?

properties.value: It provides warm water for baking and cooking, speeding up food prep.
It generates steam to cook food faster.
It helps keep food cool by cooling water.
It keeps the dishes fresh during preparation.

properties.question: Which of the following activities best demonstrates how Solvatten helps entrepreneurs increase their income?

properties.value: Solvatten is used to cool beverages for safe storage.
Solvatten is used to make safe drinking water that can be sold as a product.
Solvatten has no impact on any sales.
Solvatten is used to filter food products before sale.

properties.question: How does Solvatten support communities in rural areas?

properties.value: By providing a reliable source of clean water.
By helping to create strong internet connections for remote communities.
By offering a substitute for rainwater harvesting systems.
By allowing people to instantly grow crops with purified water.

When Solvatten is not in use, close it and store it indoors. Before you start using Solvatten again, rinse it with water. The plastics used in Solvatten are of exceptionally high quality, and the units are designed to last many years with daily use. Solvatten is robust but should be looked after and handled with care. You will know that a Solvatten needs to be
replaced when there is a hole in any part of the container or the transparent lid is too scratched to allow enough solar radiation through, and the indicator doesn´t switch to green. If the indicator gets broken, it is easy to replace. Talk to your local Solvatten representative.

value.name: 1 - Mama Enock (a solvatten expert user demonstrating how Solvatten is used).png

properties.value: If your Solvatten is usable, but you don’t need or want it any longer, please give it back to the provider or someone who wants it and will use it. If the Solvatten is damaged or leaks, you can use it as a storage case for beans or lentils, or other things. Solvatten units are made out of plastic that can be recycled. If you have a local recycling scheme, please take your unit there when it is no longer usable.

properties.title: Make money and reduce the workload with Solvatten

properties.value: Solvatten adds value for small businesses where water is an essential input into the sales of goods and services. It is a valuable tool for entrepreneurship and increases livelihoods.
Washing the udder of a cow before milking, make the milk safe for consumption last longer.

Baking sun-buns with clean, warm water from Solvatten is easy and generates
income. Advice: Do not use chlorine water. It will stop wild yeast and fermentation.

In +75°C water you can prepare rice without boiling. Insulate a wrapped pot. Soak
the rice in hot water and most rice will be ready to eat within 2 hours.
Hairdressers and beauty saloons have much clean and hot water when washing the shampoo from hair etc.
Detergents washout, and stains dissolve easier with warm water.

value.name: Filling up a cup of tea with solvatten hot purified water-Note that this is made via the white capped opening-124.png

properties.value: Selling cool bottled safe water can help boost income.
Earn extra income by selling and making fruit juice from clean, safe water. It is a mark of good quality and care for your customers.
Selling safe, clean, and rinsed vegetables is a mark of good quality and care for customers.

Restaurants and street-shop vendors use water from Solvatten to serve customers
but also when washing up. Hot water dissolves the grease.
Offering clean, warm water handwashing before serving meals is welcoming.
Hot water is helpful for both dyeing colors and bending twigs when making traditional baskets.
The feathers of a chicken is easier plucked when using hot water in the process.
Selling eggs with clean, warm water from Solvatten is easy, generates income, and uses less energy.
If you have any more tips or tricks, please feel free to contact us at hallo@solvatten.org.
